name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.70 - Marketplace & Theme Editor Overhaul
lastChange: Enhanced the Asset Editor to allow creating exchange items with payouts. Added 30+ new trophies. Fixed the Theme Editor's live preview and theme selection. Made the chat scrollbar visible.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
